parties.title: LET'S GET HAPPY AT WWDC
parties.details:
After a long day at WWDC, what's a better way to chill than with some classic cocktails, craft beer, and small bites.

Join us at 55 South from 6-8:30 p.m. on Wednesday, June 5th – just two blocks from WWDC. 

A Testlio sponsored drawing with cool Apple-themed gifts takes place at 7:30. Space is limited, so please RSVP below for the waitlist and your tickets for the drawing.

From Your Friends at Testlio

parties.title: Micro.blog WWDC Meetup 2019
parties.details:
We are organizing the 3rd Annual Micro.blog meetup during WWDC week in San Jose for anyone interested in Micro.blog. Meet Manton, Jean, and other microbloggers. Ask questions and share tips.

When: Tuesday, June 4, 12 - 2 pm.
Where: outside Grace Deli, 303 S. Almaden Blvd. (Across from the Hilton)

Please let us know if you are interested in coming so we can stake out the tables and chairs outdoors. We also need to know how many stickers to bring! There's plenty of space. It's been a fun casual get-together the last two years, so we are looking forward to it.

parties.title: Breakfast Burritos with Embrace!
parties.details:
Complimentary breakfast burritos served to all hungry attendees of WWDC & AltConf!
About this Event
To help fuel developers through the many sessions, meetups, conferences and happy hours during the week of WWDC, Embrace is serving free breakfast burritos for the iOS community!
On the mornings of June 4th and 5th, the Embrace team will be parked near the convention center handing out breakfast burritos for hungry attendees of WWDC and AltConf.
Chicken and Veggie Burritos will be served and consumed by smartest minds in the valley.
Click 'Register' to help us plan how many burritos we should prepare!
*TICKETS ARE LIMITED, AND BURRITOS WILL BE ON A FIRST-COME, FIRST-SERVED BASIS

parties.title: Take Dub Dub Out To The Ballgame
parties.details: Do you like hanging out at loud bars yelling at people 2 feet from your face? Me either. That is no way to discuss the intricacies of Marzipan. But that’s what it’s like at most of the WWDC parties and the bars downtown. Would you rather sit outside, patio-style, and watch a ballgame while you mingle with other WWDC folks? We’ve got a spot reserved on the VIP deck down the 3rd baseline.

parties.title: Walk To Fry's Electronics
parties.details: Join fellow WWDC attendees for a walk to Fry's Electronics.  Fry's is a one of a kind consumer electronics store with many stores having a theme.  San Jose has a Mayan Temple theme.

parties.title: Night of Dim Sum 2019
parties.details: Join us for a night of all-you-can-eat dim sum! Located just a couple of miles from downtown San Jose in the Westfield Valley Fair Mall (where there is also an Apple Store and a LEGO store), Din Tai Fung is internationally known as one of the world's best Shanghai dumpling restaurants.

parties.title: Night of Dim Sum 2019
parties.details: Join us for a night of all-you-can-eat dim sum! Located just a couple of miles from downtown San Jose in the Westfield Valley Fair Mall (where there is also an Apple Store and a LEGO store), Din Tai Fung is internationally known as one of the world's best Shanghai dumpling restaurants.

parties.title: sjMacIndie 2019
parties.details: sjMacIndie is the premier networking event that kicks off WWDC. It is for independent macOS and iOS developers, designers, and anyone else who's interested.

parties.title: The Loop Bash at WWDC 2019
parties.details: Join Jim Dalrymple and our exclusive sponsor Salesforce for an incredible night of music from The Houserockers on the first night of WWDC.

parties.title: Core Sushi 6.0
parties.details: Welcome to our 6th year of delicious omakase with fellow developers on the Saturday evening before WWDC! Plan on $70/person for the night - includes food, drink, and tip. Cash only, please!

parties.title: James Dempsey and the Breakpoints Live near WWDC
parties.details: Join James Dempsey and the Breakpoints for an evening of mingling and music to benefit the mission of App Camp For Girls! Now in its eighth year, the annual James Dempsey and the Breakpoints show has become a WWDC week tradition.

parties.title: The Dub Dub Run
parties.details: Kick off your mornings right with an easy 5k jog along the Guadalupe River while chattting about all the fun stuff announced at WWDC. Anyone who owns a pair of running shoes is encouraged to join us.

parties.title: The Dub Dub Climb
parties.details: Begin your day with a fun indoor climb while meeting other WWDC folks and chatting about all the announcements, afterparties and more! To keep things simple and beginner friendly, we’ll congregate and climb in the bouldering area.

parties.title: Relay FM Connected Podcast
parties.details: Gathered from the far corners of the globe, the Connected hosts make their annual trip to California to talk about WWDC, Apple’s announcements and the response from the community in what promises to be the most entertaining live podcast of the week.

parties.title: Accidental Tech Podcast
parties.details: Acc Tech

parties.title: Automators Meet-up
parties.details: A meet-up for fans of automation, hosted by the hosts of the Automators - David Sparks and Rosemary Orchard - and Supercomputer - Matthew Cassinelli and Alex Cox.

parties.title: Vapor @ WWDC19
parties.details:
A meetup to talk about all things server-side Swift and Vapor for those attending WWDC, AltConf or nearby!

Location is TBD (apparently there’s some basketball final on that’s making booking somewhere difficult for now), but worst case we’ll just all descend on San Pedro Square!

Looking forward to seeing all of you again!

parties.title: Call for Code Reception @ WWDC19
parties.details:
End your day at Apple’s Worldwide Developer’s Conference at IBM’s Call for Code Reception, and discover how you and your peers can make a difference in solving society’s most pressing issues.

Location is TBD (apparently there’s some basketball final on that’s making booking somewhere difficult for now), but worst case we’ll just all descend on San Pedro Square!

Looking forward to seeing all of you again!

parties.title: Twilio's <Gather> WWDC 2019 </Gather>
parties.details:
Gather with your friends from Twilio during Apple’s Worldwide Developer’s Conference .

Location is TBD (Thanks to NBA final)

Can't wait to see what you'll build
